# Bug Report

**1. What is broken?**
_Describe the issue clearly. (e.g., "Google Form Unlocker stuck on loading," "Mobile menu doesn't open," "Typo on the About page")_

>

**2. Affected Page / Tool:**
_Which URL or tool is this happening on? (e.g., `/tool/gfu`, `/blog/dns`, Homepage)_

>

**3. Browser & Device:**
_What are you using? (e.g., Chrome on School Chromebook, Safari on iPhone, Firefox on Windows)_

>

**4. Steps to Reproduce:**
_How can we make this happen?_

1. Go to...
2. Click...
3. See error...

**5. Screenshots / Logs (Optional):**
_If you see a red error box or a weird layout, a screenshot helps a lot. If you know how to check the Console (F12), paste errors here._

>

---

**Confirmation:**

- [ ] I have searched existing issues to ensure this bug hasn't already been reported.
